name: The large femur of a fire giant (2h)
data: It decreases hit chance like a god.
It has magnificent weapon class for its type (magnificent in general).
It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence like a god.
It does fire damage like a god.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases damage like a god.
This femur is a holy artifact of the Goddess Kirvana.
